Glory to God Almighty who ruleth in the heavens, and in whose hands are all the kingdoms of the earth Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.
4 p.
Printed for Thomas Simmons, London : [1659?]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to James Nayler. cf. NUC pre-1956. Title taken from opening two lines of text. Signed: James Naylor. Imprint from colophon.
=======
